tags.name: simple-toast
tags.description:
`simple-toast`
`A singular toast / message for conistency`

Attributes:

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - Opened state of the toast, use event to change

  * `text` {`string`} - Plain text based message to display

  * `class-style` {`string`} - Class name, fit-bottom being a useful one

  * `close-text` {`string`} - Text for the close button

  * `duration` {`number`} - How long the toast message should be displayed

  * `event-callback` {`string`} - Event callback when hide is called

  * `close-button` {`boolean`} - If there should be a close button shown

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `opened` {`boolean`} - Opened state of the toast, use event to change

  * `text` {`string`} - Plain text based message to display

  * `classStyle` {`string`} - Class name, fit-bottom being a useful one

  * `closeText` {`string`} - Text for the close button

  * `duration` {`number`} - How long the toast message should be displayed

  * `eventCallback` {`string`} - Event callback when hide is called

  * `closeButton` {`boolean`} - If there should be a close button shown

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -
